title: Removing Miss Fortune's Double Up crit?
body: Ummm. Of all the things to nerf or touch on her kit, you're removing what I'd argue to be probably the healthiest part of her kit? It's easy to counterplay against, it can be difficult to set up right, and when you knock one off, it feels satisfying. Why, of all the things you could change, you remove this? Do you want her to be an ultbot?

replies.body: Where did you see this? It's not in the patch notes
It's on the PBE right now.
It goes from crit to double damage.... whats the problem?
She's always had the double damage since the rework, along with the crit. They're outright removing the crit.
Good mf is overpowered asf right now thanks to lethality
Yep. I don't think removing that part of her kit is the right way to deal with it though.
Damn. Thanks for the heads up

Yeah stupid nerf. Players other than bronze stand beside minions or only behind healthy ones and the passive is never ever used.
I only realistically use it to speed up wave clear.

Worse of all, MF is actually a pretty mediocre laner, her kit shines mid game.
Because it was doing half of an adc's health
I mean, you could just not stand behind that minion. I'm not opposed to it being nerfed, but removing it outright just seems bad.

Yes but the cast time + range of the second bounce makes it very difficult especially when you're in the early stages of the game and you walk forward to auto a minion and mf walks up and uses q to both get a minion and deal heavy amount of damage to you, the trade just isn't fair.

They should've touched the ulti first.

IMO instantly wiping half of the ADC's HP after a successful though arguably near unavoidable setup is less egregious than say, almost instantly wiping the entire enemy team off existence by staring at the general direction of the teamfight.

And really, having MF become an ulti-bot is not so great either.

The real problem with the 7.5 changes? They gave lethality a tiny buff and it becomes strong. Instead of toning it down to 50-50 instead of 60-40 or something, they nerf every single one of Talons core item (7.4), then in 7.5 they directly nerf talon, then nerf his core items again. what the hell is rito's idea of balancing. Half the reason for lethality buff was because talon was weak, nerfing him and all his items isnt going to help.

We're gonna have an old rengar situation aren't we. Nerf him useless, then buff him op, then nerf him useless then buff him op then nerf him useless yadda yadda etc etc.

Totally forgot. They nerfed 12 of his masteries pretty heavily too.
